ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I guess if anyone wants nbwrpg.com addresses, they can have some. However, my server isn t the greatest, and I don t have a browser interface for email

Well, I guess if anyone wants nbwrpg.com addresses, they can have
some. However, my server isn't the greatest, and I don't have a browser
interface for email yet, so you would have to get SSh, log in through that
(which can be very slow if you have a modem), and then use Pine for email
(that part is good. Pine rocks if you know how to use it).

But if a bunch of people want it, I can try to set up a graphical
interface and give people nbwrpg.com emails.
